reviews.comment: This Place is super spaciouos and the service is great! definitely coming back again

reviews.name: Rahul Krishnan
reviews.comment: Peaceful ambiance and homely atmosphere. The Kerala breakfast was amazing!

reviews.name: Govind Menon
reviews.comment: Exceptional hospitality and a serene environment. The rooms are spacious and well-maintained!

reviews.name: Sarah Johnson
reviews.comment: Beautiful property with excellent amenities and warm staff. A perfect getaway spot!
